short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the behavior of the containers within jwt.io to allow better usage of the space for improved readability

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No fuzz... no buzz... This simple extension allows you to change the size of the columns in jwt.io to fill the entire screen (if you screen is bigger than the default column size) for those cases where your JWT token contains data that overflows the existing column size.

You will see now a "layout" option next to the algorithm that will allow you to change the behavior of the container.

It only needs access to the jwt.io page to function correctly and doesn't connect to any external service or page for tracking.
